entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 06:42 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: S 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 late this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
